channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- NextGen Gallery Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- NextGen Gallery Pro

item.title: CVE-2021-24293|2024-08-03T19:28:22.816Z -- unknown -- nextgen%20gallery%20pro
item.description: In the eCommerce module of the NextGEN Gallery Pro WordPress plugin before 3.1.11, there is an action to call get_cart_items via photocrati_ajax , after that the settings[shipping_address][name] is able to inject malicious javascript.
